function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variation in risk communication across states leading to different risk perceptions","Impact":"Challenges in controlling disease spread","Mitigation":"Consistent and coordinated risk communication strategies across all states","Technologies":"Communication technology for disseminating uniform risk information","People":"General public, local government authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Gaps in local production capacity and resilience across industries","Impact":"Inability to meet essential item requirements, food insecurity, exploitation of farmers","Mitigation":"Investment in local production capacity, coordination among enforcement agents, climate-resilient farming practices","Technologies":"Agricultural technology, production technology, coordination platforms","People":"Farmers, enforcement agents, vulnerable communities","Owner":"Government, agricultural organizations, enforcement agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of resilience in urban food systems and value chains","Impact":"Rise in consumer prices, exacerbation of urban poverty, food insecurity","Mitigation":"Strengthening urban food systems, supporting local value chains, addressing income losses and purchasing power reduction","Technologies":"Supply chain management technology, agricultural technology, financial support platforms","People":"Urban poor, local food producers, small businesses","Owner":"Government, food industry stakeholders"}]}
